DOC.brief_title: Trial Compare Effectiveness 2 Insecticides Preventing Malaria
DOC.detailed_description: In 2013 , new long lasting pyrethroid insecticide , K-Othrine SC 62.5 , develop Bayer AG , use IRS program Bioko Island , Equatorial Guinea , first time . This change coincide marked increase parasite prevalence 2-14 year old measure Annual Malaria Indicator Survey ( 14 % 28 % , respectively ) . In order determine whether change insecticide cause increase prevalence , cluster randomize control trial design . Twenty-four ( 24 ) cluster , contain 250-300 house select throughout Bioko Island . Clusters choose attempt maximize geographical space cluster ( minimize possible residual effect insecticide ) , ensure area historically high acceptance rate Indoor Residual Spraying ( IRS ) select . Each cluster buffer zone 300m ( halfway cluster less 600m apart ) . A team 10 local surveyor conduct baseline survey cluster area , measure prevalence malaria Rapid Diagnostic Test ( RDT ) positivity , net ownership , spray coverage , hemoglobin level . Approximately 100 child cluster test . These data use restricted randomization . Each cluster spray either deltamethrin bendiocarb , depend randomization . The IRS team put equal amount effort cluster , determine number sprayers/house/day attempt minimize bias . An end-line survey conduct use ODK Collect application cluster area . Prevalence measure RDT , hemoglobin data gather . In addition , head household ask acceptability IRS willingness receive insecticide future round .
DOC.criteria: Children 214 year old reside household within intervention area Household cluster choose among historically high IRS acceptance rate Household cluster choose maximize distance cluster . Areas historically high rate refuse IRS
